name: Delusional Thoughts
description:
LD42 Entry, Please use full screen option for best viewing experience... 

WASD - move

Spacebar -  jump hold for further jump

LeftShift - Sprint

Avoid obstacles, build combos, and collect some rusty spoons in this fast pace running out of space themed game.  You can jump over obstacles! And holding space bar allows a max jump distance of 5 spaces...
